title: Wake Up, Emily, It's Mother's Day
description: Oh, no! Mother's Day is almost here and Emily Arrow's plans are a mess. She can't think of a good present. Even the marigold she planted at school won't grow. How can she give her mother an old milk carton full of dirt?Luckily Emily gets the best Mother's Day idea in the world. It's simple too. All she needs is a little help from Linda Lorca.But two days before Mother's Day...is there still time?
author: Patricia Reilly Giff
